Ok - this is why you should never trust AI benchmarks.

A recent study compared Opus 4.6 (the latest Claude model) versus Opus 4.5 across 165 different tasks.

findings.author: milesdeutscher
findings.text:
This AI tool gets ZERO hallucinations, yet nobody is using it.

Reddit Answers.

This tool ONLY scrapes Reddit data for real responses from real people (way fewer hallucinations).
